
  # Multi-step Submission Wizard

  This is a code bundle for Multi-step Submission Wizard. The original project is available at https://www.figma.com/design/sWnfmZFGSSOtpZzJ6Kqca9/Multi-step-Submission-Wizard.

  ## Running the code

  Run `npm i` to install the dependencies.

  Run `npm run dev` to start the development server.
